document_data.name: Berdak
document_data.mainbody:
'''Berdak the Centaur''' was the proprietor of the [[Smiling Centaur]] tavern in [[Zazesspur]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
{{TOC limit|3}}
document_data.Description: Berdak was on the small side for a [[centaur]], but he was strongly built. He was clean-shaven.
document_data.Personality: Berdak was typically of a cheerful demeanor—hence, the name of his tavern.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, then-adventuress Zaranda Star visited Berdak's tavern with her traveling companions. While there, one of her companions, Father [[Pelletyr]] died of [[heartstop]], and Berdak was the first to reach the fallen [[cleric]] and the one to declare his death.
